signature.embedding_text: What is X percent of Y, find percentage of a number or value

trick.name: Percentage to Fraction

steps.action_hi: Percentage ko fraction mein convert karo
Fraction ko number se multiply karo

trick.memory_hook: Percentage matlab sau mein se kitna - X% = X/100

common_mistakes.mistake: Divide kar dete hain instead of multiply
common_mistakes.why: Percentage of means multiply, not divide

common_mistakes.mistake: Percentage ko 100 se multiply kar dete hain
common_mistakes.why: Percentage ko pehle fraction mein badlo (divide by 100)

deep.explanation: Dekh bhai, percentage matlab 'per cent' yaani 'sau mein se'. Jab 20% of 100 poochha jaaye, toh matlab 100 mein se 20 sau-waan hissa. Formula simple hai: (percentage/100) × number. Quick calculation ke liye percentages ko fractions yaad kar lo.

shortcut.explanation:
Quick method:
1. Percentage ko fraction mein badlo (20% = 1/5)
2. Number se multiply karo (1/5 × 100 = 20)

Common fractions yaad rakho: 10%=1/10, 20%=1/5, 25%=1/4, 50%=1/2
